events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role and will proceed with the next steps soon.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to the candidate's extensive developer experience and relevant skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
Initial phone screening was conducted successfully, and the candidate demonstrated strong engineering knowledge and communication skills.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to evaluate the candidate's engineering and coding abilities in depth.
